mapper.sql: where u.is_del=0 and u.is_outtage=0 and u.company_id=d.company_id and u.company_id=p.company_id and u.company_id=#{companyId}
mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.login_name email, u.user_name realName, u.company_id companyId, d.id departmentId, d.dep_name departmentName, u.login_name nickName, p.pos_name role FROM user u left join rel_dep_user rdu on u.id=rdu.user_id left join department d on d.id=rdu.dep_id left join rel_pos_user rpu on u.id=rpu.user_id left join position p on p.id=rpu.pos_id and u.login_name=#{userName} and u.password=#{passWord};
